content: this is an easy pattern to make a triangle scarf/ kerchief out of a single skein of worsted weight yarn excellent for handdyed yarn or a gradient materials -one skein worsted weight yarn -crochet hook 6 mm us j/10 -tapestry needle -scissors one skein in this context refers to a 100g hank of yarn if you have more than 100g you may end up with a much larger finished product closer to a shawl
